index.title: Confirm Reset
index.description1: To initialize, please enter the text
index.description2: You must know your mnemonic to recover your wallet before reset.

entry.title: Save Your Mnemonics
entry.subTitle: If you lose your password: Back up your mnemonic, reset your Cosmostation Extension, and start next.
entry.description1: The Cosmostation wallet does not store your password or mnemonic phrase.
entry.description2: If you lose your password, you can reset the program and restore your account using your backed-up mnemonic. However, if you lose your mnemonic, account recovery will be difficult.
entry.description3: Resetting the program will remove all registered accounts. After the reset, you can restore your accounts using your backed-up mnemonic.
